name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Moonlit Isles (I)

stage1.title: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Moonlit Isles (I)
stage1.description: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Lempo Isle, Hiisi Island, and Paha Isle.
